about_the_game:
ABOUT
Angus and the Gates of Chaos tells the story of Angus, the half-witted son of a tax collector in the fictional universe of Chanceburn. Through a series of coincidences, Angus finds himself on a quest to defeat the evil King Ruthen and prevent him from opening the Gates of Chaos and destroying all of Chanceburn.

Enjoy a classic Gameboy style adventure featuring ice puzzles, hidden collectibles, three endings, varied difficulty modes, and jokes about taxes. Lots of jokes about taxes. Proceed with caution.


ABOUT DIFFICULTY MODES
Easy - Enjoy the game's story and solve some puzzles! Minimal Challenge.
Normal - Dodge obstacles and solve puzzles at the same time! The Intended Game Experience.
Hard - Game too easy? Good luck beating this mode. For those who want a brutally hard challenge.

ABOUT THE DEMO
The demo version of Angus and the Gates of Chaos gives you access to the first three levels on the "Normal" Difficulty Mode. Save Data from the Demo does not carry over to the full game.
